reviews.review: Certainement un des jeux les plus incontournable et surtout un des plus attendus. Mon premier jeu sur ordinateur. Il est tout simplment énorme et nous attendons avec impatience la suite. Half-Life 2: Episode Three ? Half-Life 3 ? Même à 100 euros je l'achète. Et je ne suis pas le seul.
Das beste oder nichts.
good

For years i had put of playing the half life series as i was sick of hearing about it. I thought there is no way its as good as people make it out to be. However i was wrong. Extremely wrong. this game was made in 1998 and is better then alot of FPS games that come out today. I would recommend playing this 100%. Its 2016 and sure the game feels a bit unsmooth in a few place, its general smooth. And gives of a better feel then again most fps games that realese these days.
Несмотря на свой возраст и устаревшую для нынешнего времени графику, Half-Life продолжает радовать многих, в том числе и меня.
Это лучшее что я видел в своей жизни. Даже небо, даже Аллах боготворят эту игру. Оценка-11/10

HALF-LIFE! This FPS may look dated to some, but to others? Best game to date. Why? Because nostalgia. Even if you haven't played it before, it's still one heck of an experience, one that every fan of FPSes should experience. If you don't enjoy this game, that's ok. I respect your opinion, but chances are if you're reading this you haven't played this, or you're considering purchasing this game in comparison to some other game. Now, I won't go into detail on the story, because the story is best experienced in person. Before I go any further, you MUST understand that this game has been remade from scratch to look, and play to today's standards. Same game, much better. "But you haven't told me just what this miracle is called!" It's called Black Mesa (Real clever name there, eh?) If you're looking for graphics, but you want to play this game, look at that, the team did an amazing job on Black Mesa, but clearly you're still here, on the original.

So, the story? I won't go into detail on that, as previously mentioned, as the story has much more impact when you don't know what's going to happen before entering the world of Half-Life. This is true for both versions of this game.

Looking for a Half-Life remastering made by a team of professionals? Go for Black Mesa.

Looking for the original made by a team of geniuses nearly 20 years ago? Go for the original, the best, Half-Life.

Half-Life is the game that started it all, the 3D FPS Genre was redefined by this game. Players were in for a real treat when they first got this, and that experience can still be had by players around the world today. 

My opinion? I'd go for Black Mesa, but preferably, I'd play the original, then the remastered version.

10/10 Best game from 1998.

By the way, be prepared to get stuck in this game numerous times. It's a puzzle game too, y'know.
I may be 18 years late but it is as good as I had hoped.

A game that truly changed THE game. Prior to this first person shooters lacked depth. This game provided us with an engaging story and a protagonist that you cared about without ever hearing his voice. It indirectly influenced many games to come, and it directly provided the modding community with the tools required to create many new amazing games (some of which became full games in their own right).

The train sequence at the beginning of the game is still one of my most memorable experiences in gaming - it was mind blowing at the time.

Este juego marcó un antes y un después en mi vida como jugador. Lo he jugado y terminado aproximadamente 50 veces y nunca me aburre. Tiene una historia atrapante que se va desarrollando a medida que avanzamos y todo va sucediendo delante de nuestros ojos.
Los enemigos tienen una buena IA, sobre todo los soldados, se mueven en grupo, piden refuerzos, se esconden, cubren, devuelven granadas, etc. Me dieron mas de una sorpresa.
Hay capítulos que son excelentes, algunos con puzzles para resolver, otros más intensos que son pura batalla, en fin...hay de todo.
Es un clásico que no puede faltar en la biblioteca de un buen jugador. A aquéllos jóvenes que piensen que por ser viejo y tener gráficos un poco anticuados no vale la pena jugarlo, se equivocan rotundamente, denle una oportunidad y van a conocer cómo debe ser un buen FPS. Creo que hoy en día muy poquitos juegos, por no decir casi ninguno me llegaron a generar las sensaciones que causaron HL la primera vez que lo jugué.
Still my favorite single player game to play.
Игра - легенда. Положила начало целой эпохи.

Considering the game was realeased in 1998, it still makes for an amazing expereance.

This is the game that started my love affair with the FPS genre.  After playing it the first time, my only regret was not having played it sooner.  Now I've replayed it dozens of times.  Although the graphics are a bit dated, the story is still captivating and makes that easy to overlook.  The "expansions" are both worth the time investment as well.
An timeless, excellent game. Well worth it especially when on sale
